page.title: 10A CATHOLIC COMMUNITY
page.content: Religion plays a big part in my life. The home, school and church work together in our Religious Education. All of the children around here are Catholics and go to the Catholic School. My home can easily be seen as a Catholic religious home because of the pictures, the crucifix and the family prayers. We pray before meals and after, at bedtime and at special times. Births,Birthdays, Christenings, Christmas, Easter and first reception of the Sacraments are special times. "When you're praying you must put your mind to your prayers and think of what you are saying". "In church looking behind you is the worst form of bad manners when you are supposed to look at the altar and pray to God".Talk like this goes on in the house.We are taught to love, respect and forgive. Everybody goes to Mass on Sunday.
